heisig_chinese_memo: The King has a quarrel with his wife about wanting every part of his outfit to be gold... every single one - crown, hood, zipper, and even his whiskey flask.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Half siblings don't have the same blood, so they are more likely to get into a quarrel.

釁字的基本解释

釁
xìn
见“衅”。

釁字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xìn］
［《廣韻》計覲切，去震，曉。］
(1)血祭。谓杀生取血涂物以祭。
(2)缝隙；裂痕。
(3)过失；罪过；缺陷。
(4)祸患；祸乱。
(5)争端；仇怨。
(6)征兆；迹象。
(7)兽奋力奔跑之称。
(8)泛指奋动。
(9)涂。
(10)熏。参见“釁面吞炭”。
(11)通“興”。兴起。
(12)姓。

釁字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【酉字部】　釁； 康熙笔画：25； 页码：页1289第27
【唐韻】虛振切【集韻】許愼切【韻會】許刃切，?興去聲。【說文】血祭也。象祭竈也。【廣韻】牲血塗器祭也。【禮·月令】孟冬之月，命大史釁龜筴。【疏】謂殺牲以血塗釁其龜及筴。又【雜記】成廟則釁之。【疏】謂宗廟初成，則殺牲取血以釁之，尊而神之也。【史記·高祖紀】祭蚩尤於沛庭而釁鼓。【註】釁，祭也。殺牲以血塗鼓曰釁。　又罪也。【左傳·宣十二年】觀釁而動。【註】釁，罪也。　又瑕也。【左傳·桓八年】讐有釁，不可失也。【註】釁，瑕隙也。【史記·李斯傳】成大功者，在因瑕釁而遂忍之。【註】索隱曰：言因諸侯有瑕釁，則忍心而剪除也。　又兆也。【魯語】若鮑氏有釁，吾不圖矣。【註】釁，兆也。【陸機·答賈長淵詩】天厭霸德，黃祚告釁。　又塗也。一曰熏也。【齊語】比至，三釁三浴之。【註】以香塗身曰釁。【周禮·春官·肆師】共其釁鬯。【註】以鬯塗尸，使之香美也。【周禮·春官】女巫掌歲時祓除釁浴。【註】釁浴，謂以香薰草藥沐浴。【前漢·賈誼傳】釁面吞炭。【註】漆面以易貌。一曰熏也，以毒

Provocation
Basic explanation of words
Provocation
xìn

Provocation
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xìn］
["Guang Yun" plan to cut, go to shake, Xiao. ]
(1) Blood sacrifice. That means killing and taking blood to sacrifice.
(2) Cracks; cracks.
(3) Negligence; guilt; defect.
(4) Disaster; Disaster.
(5) Disputes; enmity.
(6) Signs; signs.
(7) The name of the beast struggling to run.
(8) Refers generally to excitement.
(9) Tu.
(10) Smoked. See "Provoking noodles and swallowing charcoal."
(11) Through "Xing". Rise.
(12) Last name.

[You Ji 2] [You Words Department] 　愛; Kangxi Strokes: 25; Page Number: Page 1289 Page 27
[Tang Yun] Xu Zhenqie [Jiyun] Xu Suoqie [Rhyme Hui] Xu Rianqie, go happy. [Said the text] Blood sacrifice also. It is like offering a stove. [Guangyun] Sacrifice with animal blood applicator. 【Rite·Yueling】Meng Dong’s month, the history of the provoke the tortoise calligraphy. 【Sparse】It is said that killing an animal to provoke its tortoise and 䇲 with blood. Also [Miscellaneous] Chengmiao provokes it. [Sparse] It is said that the ancestral temple is first completed, and it is also a god of honor by killing animals and collecting blood to provoke them. [Historical Records·Gao Zu Ji] Sacrifice Chi You Yu Peiting and provoke the drum. [Note] Provocation, sacrifice. Kill the animal and smear the drum with blood, saying provocation.　It's a crime again. [Zuo Zhuan·Xuan Twelve Years] Watching provocations and moving. [Note] Provocation is also a crime.　It's flawed. [Zuo Zhuan·Eight Years of Huan] Qiu is provocative, and you can't lose it. [Note] Provocation, flaws are also. 【Historical Records·Li Si Chuan】Those who have made great achievements will endure it because of provocations. [Note] Suo Yin said: Because the princes have flaws and provocations, they will endure and cut them out.　It's also a trillion. [Lu Yu] If Bao's provocation is provoked, I will not try to stop it. [Note] Provocation, Zhao Ye. [Lu Ji·Answers to Jia Changyuan's Poems] Huang Zuo provokes him because he is disgusted with virtue.　 Paint it again. One said smoked. [Qiyu] Bizhi, three provocations and three baths. [Note] Coating the body with incense means provocation. 【Zhou Li·Chun Guan·Si Shi】Together with his provocations. [Note] Coat the corpse with a scorpion to make it fragrant and beautiful. [Zhou Li·Chunguan] The witches take a bath when they are old. [Note] Provocative bathing means bathing with aromatherapy herbs. [Previous Han·Jia Yi Biography] Provoked noodles to swallow charcoal. [Note] Lacquered surface is easy to look.
